INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing Antilink
This cog will block any invite link that isn't send by a mod/admin

For setup instructions please see the GitHub Wiki(<https://github.com/Kowlin/refactored-cogs/wiki>)
For support: <https://support.kowlin.xyz>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/kowlin>
NAME: Antilink
SHORT: Automaticly remove Discord links from users
DESCRIPTION: Automaticly remove Discord invite links from users.
